title: PTD Today — Media
disclaimer: Informational only — AI-generated summaries; may contain errors. Verify with the original video.

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Daniel Tom, 31, owns and operates Bay Area Sanitation, managing a fleet of almost 2,000 portable toilets that service construction sites and events across the San Francisco Bay Area. The company reported $4.3 million in total income in 2025 and the story was produced by CNBC Make It.
bullets: Owner: Daniel Tom, 31.
Company: Bay Area Sanitation — nearly 2,000 portable toilets.
Service area: construction sites and events across the San Francisco Bay Area.
Financials: $4.3 million in total income in 2025.
Source: CNBC Make It video feature.
takeaways: A regionally concentrated, high-unit physical service fleet (nearly 2,000 units) underscores the operational importance of local logistics and access when siting infrastructure.
Consistent revenue ($4.3M reported) from service-heavy operations highlights demand stability to consider when evaluating regional service ecosystems.
Serving construction sites and events suggests variable, location-specific demand patterns—emphasize flexible access and transportation corridors in planning decisions.

items.title: Zip Up, Clip In, Copilot On

takeaways: If route planning is part of your grid or data-center operations, Copilot Groups may be worth evaluating for planning workflows.
The description is high-level—request demos or technical details to assess fit with operational requirements.
Evaluate data security, integration, and deployment specifics before considering Copilot Groups for critical infrastructure.
Use official Microsoft resources or hands-on trials to determine practical benefits for route and operations planning.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description… KPMG podcast hosts Katarzyna Chojniak and Alicja Barska explain that AI is already a routine part of audit work, helping automate repetitive tasks, analyse full data populations and support better decisions. They outline practical tools (AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI, KPMG Clara and Clara for Clients), the shift from sampling to population analysis, and implementation challenges including skills, data security and regulation.
bullets: AI Transaction Scoring Tool enables analysis of entire populations rather than sampling.
Clara AI serves as a conversational assistant with specialised agents to support auditors.
KPMG Clara platform provides real-time audit management; Clara for Clients modernises client communication.
AI supports documentation and disclosure analysis, changing auditors’ roles and required competencies.
Key implementation issues: auditor adaptation, data security, regulatory environment and potential AI risks.
takeaways: Expect audits to move from sampling to full-population analysis, yielding more comprehensive insights.
Ensure strong data security and regulatory compliance when sharing operational or telemetry data with auditors.
Plan for auditor/vendor interaction via real-time platforms (like KPMG Clara) that can streamline communication and evidence exchange.
Invest in relevant skills and processes so internal teams can engage effectively with AI-enabled audit workflows.

items.title: Arknights: Endfield | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Launch Trailer

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Arknights: Endfield has officially launched and the trailer highlights NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation. The game is a 3D real-time strategy RPG in which you play the Endministrator exploring Talos-II, and the trailer was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings using DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode.
bullets: Arknights: Endfield launch announced; game is a 3D real-time strategy RPG.
Trailer features NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation (4X Mode).
Captured on GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings.
Links provided for DLSS 4 details and the game's official site.
Official social channels listed for Arknights: Endfield and NVIDIA GeForce.
takeaways: DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation is showcased — verify compatibility and support for DLSS 4 in your GPU/software stack.
Trailer capture used an RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra — consider hardware capable of running DLSS 4 if supporting high‑fidelity real‑time rendering or streaming workloads.
Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode is demonstrated — test available MFG modes to evaluate quality and throughput tradeoffs in your environment.
Consult the provided NVIDIA and game links for technical integration details and official documentation before deployment decisions.
